spirit.name: The Botanist
spirit.description: The Botanist is a gin of layered complexity. A progressive exploration of the botanical heritage of our Isle of Islay.
spirit.longDescription: Hand-foraged on the windswept hills of Islay, The Botanist features 22 local botanicals that are gently distilled in our unique Lomond pot still. This artisanal Islay gin is a rare expression of the heart and soul of our remote Scottish island home.
servingsuggestions: Premium tonic water with a twist of lemon peel
Neat over ice to appreciate the complexity

promotion.headline: Manager's Special - July
promotion.offerText: Enjoy 25% off all serves of The Botanist throughout July
